text: Ilya Yefimovich Repin (; Ukrainian: Ілля́ Єфи́мович Рéпін , – 29 September 1930) was an important Russian painter and sculptor. ==Biography== Repin was born in a village near Kharkiv, Russian Empire (now in Ukraine). He came from a poor family. Repin first learned to paint from an icon painter. He studied at the Academy of Fine Arts in Saint Petersburg. Later, he became a professor of painting at the same academy. He is best known for his paintings of scenes from Russian history and his portraits. ==References== Category:1844 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Russian painters
